str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Large, great, in the widest sense.
A dinner, an afternoon or evening meal. From the same as dapane; dinner, i.e. The chief meal.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I call, summon, invite, (b) I call, name. Akin to the base of keleuo; to 'call'.
